Name: Shattered Gardens

Unlock magical spells on your adventure - These will help you defeat monsters! Multiplayer mode! Read this! We are still fully dedicated to making Shattered Gardens the best game it can be, and the continued community feedback and support will help us achieve this. We will start to post regular updates and screenshots of our progress across all of our social media pages. Thank you everyone for your continued support.
